mapper.insert: insert into member(m_id, m_name, m_imei,m_birth, m_email,m_house, password) values(#{m_id},#{m_name},#{m_imei},#{m_birth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{m_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{m_house}, #{password})
mapper.select: with get_count AS ( select m_id, count(*) use_count, count(CASE WHEN NOSHOW is not null THEN 1 END) noshow_count from attend group by m_id ), get_point AS ( select m_id ,point-use_point as unused_point from ( select m_id, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN po_exact = 0 THEN po_result END),0) as point,nvl(sum(CASE WHEN po_exact = 1 THEN po_result END),0) as use_point from POINT group by m_id ) ) select m.m_id, m.m_name, substr(m.m_id,3,11) phone, to_char(m.m_birth,'yy.MM.dd') m_birth, to_char(m.m_regdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') m_regdate, m.m_profile, nvl(gc.use_count,0) use_count, nvl(gc.noshow_count,0) noshow_count, nvl(gp.unused_point,0) unused_point from member m left outer join get_count gc on m.m_id = gc.m_id left outer join get_point gp on m.m_id = gp.m_id where m.m_id = #{m_id}
select count(*) from member where m_id not like 'a%'
select count(*) from (select * from driver where d_j_date is not null)
